document.full_text: chris dowe and jeremy kendle scored 16 points apiece and bellarmine held on to defeat byu-hawaii 71-68 to win the ncaa division ii championship at the massmutual center.
document.title: bellarmine 71, byu-hawaii 68: bellarmine wins division 2 title over byu-hawaii
lines_and_colors: chris dowe and jeremy kendle scored 16 points apiece and bellarmine held on to defeat byu-hawaii 71-68 to win the ncaa division ii championship at the massmutual center.
